entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 23.

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Wind northwest 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 08 January 2023
